page.title: 04ELBURTON PLAYGROUP
page.content: Elburton{playgroup}was started on March 11th, 1968. It has now been open 17 years. The teacher says that she opened the playgroup because it was badly needed and was something useful to do. The playgroup is open five days a week from 9.00 am to 12.00 noon. On Thursdays it is open in the afternoon. On average,{30 children}go to the playgroup, all aged 3, 4 or 5. We asked the children in the playgroup some questions: Q) Do you like the playgroup? A) Everyone said yes. Q) Do you have brothers and sisters? A) Most children said yes. Q) Do you have many friends here? A) All children had 3 or 4 friends. We found that the playgroup was a very useful and happy place.
